content:
Luca Limongelli, Tiziana Cantarelli 2010-08-31 7010 ASFA - Web site ASFA - site web ASFA - sitio web 50 Aquatic Sciences and Fisheries Abstracts - Web site R\ufffd\ufffdsum\ufffd\ufffds des sciences aquatiques et halieutiques - Site Web Res\ufffd\ufffdmenes sobre las Ciencias Acu\ufffd\ufffdticas y la Pesca - Sitio Web Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (FAO-UN) FI Institutional Websites FAO 18131 ASFA Thesaurus The ASFA Thesaurus is an indexing and searching tool. It contains the subject descriptors used to index the records which are contained in the Aquatic Sciences and Fisheries Abstracts (ASFA) bibliographic database. ASFA is an abstracting and indexing service covering the world's literature on the science, technology, management, and conservation of marine, brackish water, and freshwater resources and environments, including their socio-economic and legal aspects.

]]> With your currently running browser
you can use ASFA Thesaurus but it will have limited functionality
Click here to continue without "collection" function.

If you want to use ASFA Thesaurus with all functions, especially with "collecting terms" function:
we recommend to use another browser like Netscape Navigator
